title: Movie And TV News Round-Up - Plus Kaya Scodelario Interview!
content: Kaya Scodelario stops by - through the magic of the internet, that is - the podcast this week to talk about her new Christmas movie called, um, This Is Christmas. It's very Christmassy. Elsewhere on the podcast, the first half is all about the amazing avalanche of movie and TV news that's been occurring of late, with trailers for Indiana Jones 5, Guardians 3 and more all arriving, plus bits and pieces on The Last Of Us adaptation, His Dark Materials and much more.
